channel.title: ObjC on 湖间小筑
channel.description: Recent content in ObjC on 湖间小筑

item.title: Compile Object-C program in command line
item.description: Recently I am working on an iOS project, and I am getting interested in the language itself. But it is inconvenient to start Xcode for each program, especially for program without UI elements in. So I want to set up a command line environment that can compile and execute ObjC program.
